item.title: 巴西 Azul 航空公司因与出租人达成债务协议而股价大涨
item.description: 巴西航空公司Azul宣布与出租人达成债务协议后，其股价周二跳涨，分析师认为，自媒体报道称该公司正酝酿申请破产保护以来，该协议消除了悬而未决的问题。【原文：Shares in Brazilian airline Azul jumped on Tuesday after it announced a debt deal with lessors, which analysts see removing an overhang in place since media reports suggested the firm was mulling a Chapter 11 bankruptcy filing.】

item.title: 中国对美国芯片和联网汽车政策表示担忧
item.description: 中国商务部长周二就美国对华半导体政策和对中国联网汽车的限制向美国商务部长吉娜-雷蒙多（Gina Raimondo）表达了 "严重关切"。【原文：China's commerce minister expressed "serious concerns" to U.S. Secretary of Commerce Gina Raimondo on Tuesday over U.S. semiconductor policies toward China and restrictions on Chinese connected vehicles.】

item.title: Northvolt 子公司在项目撤销后申请破产
item.description: 法院备案文件显示，瑞典Corpd公司的一家子公司Northvolt在其开发的项目被取消后于周二申请破产，而这家资金紧张的电池制造集团的其他公司则继续整合业务。【原文：A subsidiary of corpdSweden's Northvolt filed for bankruptcy on Tuesday after the project it was developing was cancelled, court filings showed, while the rest of the cash-strapped battery making group continued to consolidate operations.】

item.title: TikTok 遭 13 个州和华盛顿特区起诉，被控伤害年轻用户
item.description: 本周二，TikTok 面临美国 13 个州和哥伦比亚特区提起的新诉讼，指控这个流行的社交媒体平台伤害和未能保护青少年。【原文：TikTok faces new lawsuits filed by 13 U.S. states and the District of Columbia on Tuesday, accusing the popular social media platform of harming and failing to protect young people.】

item.title: 密尔顿会议前佛罗里达州港口关闭，南卡罗来纳州限制航行
item.description: 美国海岸警卫队的报告显示，在飓风米尔顿来临之前，包括坦帕和萨拉索塔在内的佛罗里达州大部分港口在周二关闭，禁止所有船只通行，而南卡罗来纳州包括查尔斯顿在内的码头也开始实施航行限制。【原文：Most Florida ports including Tampa and Sarasota were closed on Tuesday to all vessel traffic ahead of Hurricane Milton, while terminals in South Carolina including Charleston began imposing navigation restrictions, reports by the U.S. Coast Guard showed.】

item.title: 弧钒交易将助力力拓进入锂供应商大联盟
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto）正在洽谈收购锂生产商钒锂公司（Arcadium Lithium），该交易将使这家英澳矿业公司成为电动汽车电池金属的第三大生产商。【原文：Rio Tinto , is in talks to buy lithium producer Arcadium Lithium , pursuing a deal that could make the Anglo-Australian miner the third-largest producer of the electric-vehicle battery metal.】

item.title: 费森尤斯希望在飓风破坏巴克斯特后提高产量
item.description: 德国费森尤斯公司表示，该公司正在研究在北卡罗来纳州的一家工厂比原计划更快地启动新的输液生产线的方案，以帮助缓解因飓风海伦对竞争对手百特公司在该州的北科夫生产基地造成的潜在短缺。【原文：Germany's Fresenius said it is checking options to start new infusion-solution production lines faster than planned at a North Carolina facility to help mitigate potential shortages due to the impact of Hurricane Helene on rival Baxter's North Cove site in the same state.】

item.title: Adobe 将提供免费应用程序，帮助标注人工智能生成的内容
item.description: Adobe 公司周二表示，它将从明年开始提供一款免费的网络应用程序，旨在帮助图像和视频创作者为他们在人工智能系统中使用的作品获得信用。【原文：Adobe said on Tuesday it will offer a free web-based app starting next year, aimed at helping the creators of images and videos to get credit for their work used in AI systems.】

item.title: 兴登堡研究公司持有 Roblox 的空头头寸
item.description: 兴登堡研究公司（Hindenburg Research）周二披露了 Roblox 的空头头寸，称这家电子游戏公司一直在向投资者和监管机构谎报其平台的用户数量。【原文：Hindenburg Research on Tuesday disclosed a short position in Roblox , saying the videogame company has been lying to investors and regulators about the number of users on its platform.】

item.title: 美国 8 月贸易逆差大幅收窄
item.description: 由于出口增加而进口下降，8 月份美国贸易赤字大幅收窄，这表明贸易可能会在第三季度小幅拖累经济增长。【原文：The U.S. trade deficit narrowed sharply in August as exports increased and imports fell, suggesting that trade could be a small drag on economic growth in the third quarter.】

item.title: 世界黄金协会称，黄金 ETF 在 9 月份实现了第五个月的资金流入
item.description: 世界黄金协会（WGC）周二表示，随着北美上市基金增持黄金，9月份全球实物黄金交易所交易基金（ETF）连续第五个月实现资金流入。【原文：Global physically backed gold exchange-traded funds (ETFs) registered a fifth consecutive month of inflows in September as North America-listed funds added to their holdings, the World Gold Council (WGC) said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧元区经济动荡不安，欧洲央行将在 10 月和 12 月降息 25 个基点
item.description: 路透社调查显示，超过 90% 的经济学家认为欧元区通胀将加速下降，欧洲中央银行（ECB）将于 10 月 17 日下调存款利率 25 个基点，并于 12 月再次下调。【原文：The European Central Bank (ECB) will cut its deposit rate by 25 basis points on Oct. 17 and again in December, according to more than 90% of economists polled by Reuters who now see a quicker decline in euro zone inflation.】

item.title: 在线零售商 Shein 2023 年在英国的销售额达到 20 亿美元
item.description: 这家在线快速时尚集团周二提交的一份文件显示，Shein 的英国业务在 2023 年的收入为 15.5 亿英镑（约合 20.3 亿美元），税前利润为 2440 万英镑，该公司正准备按计划在伦敦上市。【原文：Shein's British business made 1.55 billion pounds ($2.03 billion) in revenue in 2023 and a profit before tax of 24.4 million pounds, a filing by the online fast-fashion group showed on Tuesday, as the company prepares for a planned listing in London.】

item.title: Lyft 宣布改善司机薪酬的措施
item.description: Lyft 周二表示，将提高其平台上司机的收入，为超时搭车和比预计时间至少长 5 分钟的搭车支付更多费用。【原文：Lyft said on Tuesday it would improve earnings for drivers on its platform by paying more for going out of their way for a ride and for those that are at least five minutes longer than estimated.】

item.title: 电动汽车增长放缓，通用汽车寻求缓解投资者担忧
item.description: 本周二，通用汽车公司（General Motors）将试图安抚股东们的忧虑，即电动汽车需求的滞后和汽油驱动卡车需求高峰期的到来将给该公司带来艰难的发展道路。【原文：General Motors will seek to soothe shareholders' worries on Tuesday that lagging demand for electric vehicles and perceived peak demand for gasoline-powered trucks will create a rough road ahead for the automaker.】

item.title: 优步将推出由 OpenAI 的 GPT-4o 支持的人工智能助手，帮助司机实现电动化
item.description: 优步技术公司（Uber Technologies）将推出一款由 OpenAI 技术驱动的人工智能助手，帮助司机过渡到电动汽车，这也是该公司降低排放努力的一部分。【原文：Uber Technologies will roll out an AI assistant powered by OpenAI's technology to help drivers transition to electric vehicles, as part of its efforts to lower emissions.】

item.title: 刺激政策乐观情绪消退，在美上市中国企业股价下滑
item.description: 在美国上市的中国公司股票周二下跌，上海股市在长达一周的休市后开局不佳，投资者担心缺乏新的刺激措施来推动经济复苏。【原文：U.S.-listed shares of Chinese companies fell on Tuesday, tracking an underwhelming start for Shanghai markets after a week-long break, as investors worried over the lack of new stimulus measures to power an economic recovery.】

item.title: 7-Eleven 和 Circle K 在美国卷烟销售中占据主导地位，合并后将面临来自 Vapes 和廉价烟的风险
item.description: Couche-Tard 对 7-Eleven 所有者 Seven & i 的收购将使合并后的连锁便利店在美国香烟销售中占据主导地位，并努力推动烟草公司提高价格和促销活动，包括 ZYN 等快速增长的尼古丁袋装香烟。【原文：A Couche-Tard takeover of 7-Eleven owner Seven & i would position the combined convenience store chain to dominate U.S. cigarette sales and try to push tobacco companies for better prices and promotions - including on fast-growing nicotine pouches like ZYN.】

item.title: 保时捷因电池短路风险在美国召回超过 27,000 辆电动汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周二表示，保时捷将在美国召回27527辆电动轿车，原因是担心它们的电池模块可能会发生短路。【原文：Porsche is recalling 27,527 electric sedans in the U.S. over concerns they may experience a short circuit within the battery module, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国官员称中国过度供应锂以淘汰对手
item.description: 一位美国高级官员在访问锂储量丰富的葡萄牙时表示，中国锂生产商正用这种关键金属充斥全球市场，并导致价格 "掠夺性 "下跌，因为他们正试图淘汰竞争项目。【原文：Chinese lithium producers are flooding the global market with the critical metal and causing a "predatory" price drop as they seek to eliminate competing projects, a senior U.S. official said on a visit to Portugal that has ample lithium reserves.】

item.title: 期货走高，通胀数据和盈利可期
item.description: 美国股指期货周二上涨，在前一交易日下挫后有所回升，投资者在等待关键通胀数据和本周晚些时候开始的第三季度财报季为利率路径提供新的线索。【原文：U.S. stock index futures gained on Tuesday, recovering after a selloff in the previous session, as investors await fresh clues on the interest rate path from key inflation data and the third-quarter earnings season that starts later this week.】

item.title: 早间竞价股市停滞不前，恒生指数下跌，石油退潮
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 客户紧缩零食和汽水开支，百事公司下调销售预期
item.description: 百事公司周二下调了年销售额增长预期，原因是北美挑剔的消费者限制了在汽水和美味零食上的消费，而选择了更便宜的自有品牌。【原文：PepsiCo cut its forecast for annual sales growth on Tuesday as picky consumers in North America limit their spending on sodas and savory snacks, while opting for cheaper private-label brands.】

item.title: 美国将就谷歌如何促进网络搜索竞争提出建议
item.description: 美国司法部预计将于周二概述可能会命令 Alphabet 旗下的谷歌采取何种行动来恢复在线搜索领域的竞争，其中可能包括拆分这家大型科技公司。【原文：The U.S. Department of Justice is expected to outline on Tuesday what kind of actions Alphabet's Google could be ordered to take to restore competition in online search, potentially including a breakup of the Big Tech company.】

item.title: 市场：美联储在新一轮推动中可能难以摆脱逆回购的污名
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会正在鼓励银行利用其长期回避的现金支持，以支持其货币政策和金融稳定目标。美联储的最新努力可能不会带来太大的影响。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve is encouraging banks to count on its long-shunned cash backstops in a bid to support its monetary policy and financial stability goals. Its latest efforts may not move the dial much.】

item.title: 昂贵的万圣节巧克力被软糖、甘草和奶油巧克力取代
item.description: 希望在今年万圣节收集到大把巧克力糖的 "不给糖就捣蛋 "者可能会有些失望。【原文：Trick-or-treaters hoping to collect handfuls of chocolate candy this Halloween might be facing a bit of a letdown.】

item.title: 特斯拉的机器人出租车将在本周的发布会上接受质疑和审查
item.description: 本周四，特斯拉（Tesla）将迎来一个分水岭，公司首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）将在好莱坞华纳兄弟电影公司（Warner Bros Hollywood studio）的舞台上公布拖延已久的机器人出租车（robotaxi）计划。【原文：Tesla faces a watershed moment on Thursday when CEO Elon Musk takes the stage at the Warner Bros Hollywood studio to unveil much-delayed plans for a robotaxi, a project that has reignited the electric vehicle maker's stock, despite cooling expectations for EV growth.】

item.title: 辉瑞和 BioNTech 赢得 CureVac 英国 COVID 疫苗专利无效的竞标
item.description: 辉瑞公司及其德国合作伙伴 BioNTech 周二在伦敦高等法院宣布竞争对手 CureVac 的两项专利无效，并取得了胜利。【原文：Pfizer and its German partner BioNTech on Tuesday won their attempt to invalidate two of rival CureVac's patents at London's High Court.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：霍尼韦尔将分拆先进材料业务
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，霍尼韦尔正计划分拆其先进材料业务。【原文：Honeywell is planning to spin off its Advanced Materials business, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普组织将在越南开发价值 15 亿美元的高尔夫球场和酒店项目
item.description: 越南房地产开发商金百城（KBC）周二表示，其子公司已与特朗普组织（The Trump Organization）合作，在越南北部开发一个价值 15 亿美元的高尔夫球场和酒店项目。【原文：Vietnam's real estate developer Kinhbac City (KBC) said on Tuesday that its subsidiary has partnered with The Trump Organization to develop a $1.5 billion golf course and hotel project in northern Vietnam.】
